name: Swordquest: WaterWorld
overview: Join the SwordQuest Challenge. Dive into the depths of WaterWorld and search for clues to win the Grand Prize of the WaterWorld contest - a jewel-encrusted crown made at a cost of $25,000. Capture the Crown and compete for the Sword of Ultimate Sorcery - a silver-bladed sword made at a cost of $50,000. You'll need expert hand-eye coordination to navigate the school of octopi, the sea of sharks, and the fast-moving ice floes that block your journey. You'll also need a detective-type mind to figure out the numerical clues of this adventure-puzzle game, and to decipher the clues in the accompanying comic book.
